ClassDef.Name: GUI3D

Properties.Name: CanvasSize
Properties.Description: Determines the canvas size for this GUI

Properties.Name: Shaded
Properties.Description: Determines if this GUI3D should be affected by lighting

Properties.Name: FaceCamera
Properties.Description: Determines if this GUI3D always face the camera?

Properties.Name: Transparent
Properties.Description: Determines if the background should be transparent. Recommended to be set to false if transparent background is not needed.

ClassDef.Description: GUI3D is a class that allows GUI to be displayed in a 3D space.
